class bau_class.BusinessAsUsual(tree, bau_emit_time=[0, 30, 60], bau_emit_level=[52.0, 70.0, 81.4])[source]¶
bau_emissions_setup()[source]¶

create default business as usual emissions path. The emissions rate in each period are assumed to be the average of the emissions at the beginning and at the end of the period

Returns:None
Parameters:input – None
